body:
The blog from last August  https://blog.golang.org/go15gc  and this talk
from Gophercon https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aiv1JOfMjm0  should answer
most of your questions.



On Tue, Jul 5, 2016 at 5:15 PM, carlfn <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @RLH <https://github.com/RLH> Thanks for looking into it. My output is
> similar. Is there a doc that I can read that explains the reasoning behind
> this?
>
